ygData.subject: RE: Newbie questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I have my bard - and I have an enchanter. The enchanters charisma is nearly twice that of my bard. I just WISH her lull lined worked as effectively as lament
ygData.messageBody:
I have my bard - and I have an enchanter. The enchanters charisma is nearly
twice that of my bard.

I just WISH her lull lined worked as effectively as lament has for me since
the day I got it.





At 01:30 PM 10/27/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Wed, 27 Oct 1999, Thormael LGT wrote:
>>
>> I wouldn't say no one as druids (harmony, outdoors only but AoE), clerics
>> and enchanters (lull line) also get calm spells that allow them to do so.
>
>Maybe it's my charisma, but I haven't found the spells to be
>anywhere near as reliable as Lament. I got lazy for about 10
>levels and let the clerics and paladins I usually group with
>do the lulling. It worked roughly half the time. I can count
>on both hands the number of times Lament has failed between
>level 8-40.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
